header.title: Countries We Support
header.subtitle: MedEminence facilitates access to medical treatment in India for international patients seeking coordinated care

intro.title: Countries We Support
intro.desc: MedEminence provides healthcare coordination services for international patients seeking treatment in India. Our focus is on facilitating access to accredited hospitals and licensed medical professionals in India.

selectiveRegions.title: Selective Support Regions
selectiveRegions.desc: Support from selective regions is evaluated based on medical urgency, visa feasibility, and treatment requirements.

countriesList.title: Browse Countries by Region
countriesList.subtitle: Click on any country to view detailed information and available services

comparison.title: Country Comparison
comparison.subtitle: Compare key metrics across different regions

whyIndia.title: India as Healthcare Destination
whyIndia.desc: India has emerged as a global healthcare destination due to its combination of advanced medical infrastructure, experienced healthcare professionals, and internationally accredited hospitals.
points: Efficient care pathways compared with many regions
Multilingual medical teams and international patient departments
whyIndia.disclaimer: Timelines and outcomes vary based on medical condition, hospital availability, and regulatory factors.

coordinationInfo.title: Our Coordination Role
points: Facilitating access to healthcare providers in India
Coordinating medical case reviews and evaluations
Maintaining clear separation from clinical decision-making
Focusing on non-medical coordination and support

cta.title: Begin Your Coordinated Healthcare Journey
cta.desc: Share your medical information for structured coordination with accredited healthcare providers in India.

steps.title: Initial Enquiry
steps.desc: Submit medical details and treatment requirements

steps.title: Feasibility Assessment
steps.desc: Evaluate medical suitability and travel feasibility

steps.title: Ongoing Support
steps.desc: Provide continuous coordination throughout the journey
